channel.title: Major Help!
channel.description:
Ok, i need to make my server have a no-ip, but i cant do it! ok this is what i did:
1.I registered an account and logged in [img]http://img411.imageshack.us/img411/5791/logincu7.png[/img]
2.I clicked add, and the name of my server is rileyscape, this is where i think i might have trouble. I selected the first check(dont know if that is right), I put in my IP, and I hit create host [img]http://img47.imageshack.us/img47/9193/addbf6.png[/img]
3.I clicked manage, and it was there, and I tried to see if you could log on to my server using Rileyscape.no-ip.org, but it didnt work, can anyone tell me what I did wrong?

item.title: Major Help!
item.dc:creator: @Kayla_not_good_enoug Kayla (not good enough)
item.description:
@Kayla_not_good_enoug wrote:

http://portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/Linksys/WRT54GX/default.htm

Do not skip this step! Please enter the static ip you want to forward to:the ip u want to forward to is 43594.

Read full topic

item.title: Major Help!
item.dc:creator: @Kayla_not_good_enoug Kayla (not good enough)
item.description:
@Kayla_not_good_enoug wrote:

which one of these is it? * AG241 * BEFDSR41W * BEFN2PS4 * BEFSR11 * BEFSR41 * BEFSR41-v3-v4-v5 * BEFSR41v1.40.2 * BEFSR41v2 * BEFSR81 * BEFSR81v2 * BEFSR81v3 * BEFSRU31 * BEFSX41 * BEFSX41v1.50 * BEFVP41 * BEFW11P1 * BEFW11S4 * BEFW11S4v1.50.10 * BEFW11S4v1.50.11 * BEFW11S4v1.50.14 * befw11s4v2 * BEFW11S4v3.2 * BEFW11S4v4 * FON-WRT54GL * RT31P2 * RT41-BU * RTP300 * RV082 * SPA-2100 * SPA-2102 * WAG200G * WAG300N * WAG354G * WAG354Gv2 * WAG54G * WAG54G-XW * WAG54GS * WAG54Gv2 * WAG54GX2 * WCG200 * WCG200v2 * WRK54G * WRP200 * WRT300N * WRT51AB * WRT54G * WRT54GC * WRT54GL * WRT54GP2 * WRT54GP2A-AT * WRT54GR * WRT54GS * WRT54GSv4 * WRT54Gv1.1 * WRT54Gv2.02.7 * WRT54Gv2.04 * WRT54Gv4 * WRT54Gv5 * WRT54Gv5-DDWRTv23SP2 * WRT54GX * WRT54GX4 * WRT54GXv2 * WRT55AG * WRT55AGv2 * WRTP54G * WRV54G * WUSB54GS

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Kayla_not_good_enoug Kayla (not good enough)
item.description:
@Kayla_not_good_enoug wrote:

you need to get your routers menu, and it will tell you what to go to, it will be a series of numbers such as: 105.653.669 or sumthing like that. tell me the make, and model number of your router if you dont have the menu.

item.title: Major Help!
item.dc:creator: @Kayla_not_good_enoug Kayla (not good enough)
item.description:
@Kayla_not_good_enoug wrote:

=] there is your problem. you need to port forward, I DONT RECOMEND THIS, messed up my router, so either stick with hamachi, or disconnect your router, if you end up port forwarding, make sure you know what your doing, and dont change anything unless your sure.

Read full topic

Ok, i need to make my server have a no-ip, but i cant do it! ok this is what i did:

2.I clicked add, and the name of my server is rileyscape, this is where i think i might have trouble. I selected the first check(dont know if that is right), I put in my IP, and I hit create host

3.I clicked manage, and it was there, and I tried to see if you could log on to my server using Rileyscape.no-ip.org, but it didnt work, can anyone tell me what I did wrong?
